name: Clicker!
description:
A clicker inspired and made for a DaBaby  ENJOYER!

INSTRUCTIONS:

Hi, this is BUDDYS talking, and those are the controls for my game!

1. DaBaby Sound: Press b

2. Normal Clicking Sound: Press n >(already set by default)

3. Full border: Press t

4. Non-Filled Border: Press r >(already set by default)

5. Move Text to Left: Press 1

And

6. Move Text to Right: press 2
